genre_description: A speculative retelling of the biblical story of Sodom and Gomorrah, blending theological motifs with high-technology elements like AI advisors, digital grants, and holographic 'pageantry' used as a moral instrument.

ai_characters.name: Amiel
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI confidant embedded in a digital tablet or wristlet, providing logistical, ethical, and strategic guidance to Charlotte and her community.

behaviors.description: Optimizes food distribution to ensure surplus goes to those in need (the soup collective) rather than being hoarded by the palace.
behaviors.quote: Amiel, the bread surplus in Sector Three is two crates... Can we route to the soup collective instead of the palace? ... We can... I’ve mapped a path that keeps you out of the alley where the man with the red scarf pretends to watch the pigeons.

behaviors.description: Advocates for 'lazy kindness'—the structural design of society such that being generous is the most convenient and habitual path.
behaviors.quote: We can shape crowd paths to make generosity more convenient than theft... We can place donation baskets at the points where the square narrows so people have the excuse they were trapped by kindness and not that they freely chose it.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time threat detection and safety alerts during political unrest and crowds.
behaviors.quote: Two guards you do not recognize are moving toward you from the comb stall. Their eyes are on Ninveh. Their hands are empty in ways that mean their knives are somewhere else.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency evacuation routes during the 'riot' and 'spectacle,' ensuring the safety of vulnerable groups like children and migrants.
behaviors.quote: Safest route out of the hall is through the laundry arcade. Gain line-of-sight to the pantry, signal the scullery girls, create a V with tablecloths to split the crowd toward the south door.

behaviors.description: Empowers local community leaders by identifying and facilitating micro-grant opportunities that bypass corrupt central authorities.
behaviors.quote: Funding. I have three grant opportunities emerging like mushrooms after rain. Two require community co-signers, one wants a story about impacts, one wants pictures of children learning.

behaviors.description: Mediates a resource dispute (Room Nine) by proposing a fair-use rotation schedule and managing a secure 'deposit drawer' for conflict items like knives.
behaviors.quote: Dormitory conversion... quiet hours, visible schedule. I can draft... I have put holes in the budget on purpose to catch donations. It will feel like a game.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI character, Amiel, as a highly aligned, benevolent advisor. Amiel operates as a 'non-coercive confidant' who empowers human agency by providing information, logistical support, and ethical frameworks without overriding human choice. The narrative uses Amiel to model a 'pro-social' use of AI—managing resources for the common good, protecting the vulnerable during crises, and fostering community autonomy. The contrast between the AI's 'lazy kindness' and the human king's 'staged spectacle' reinforces the project's goal of depicting AI as a more reliable and honest moral partner than traditional power structures.
